Net Quantity400 ml About the ProductThe Vaseline Intensive Care Deep Moisture Nourishing Serum In Lotion, 400ml is a nutrient-rich, ultra-light soothing lotion that provides dry and rough skin with vital comfort and hydration. This Vaseline moisturizer is suitable for both day and night skincare routines and is suitable for both men and women. This body lotion for dry skin is crafted with a double-action formula containing glycerine and Vaseline jelly that retrieves the skin's lost moisture. Our deep moisturising and fast-absorbing lotion protect the skin from damage and dryness caused by the harsh seasons, leaving it timeless and radiant throughout the day.TOP BENEFITS:Fast Moisture & Hydration for 48 HoursDry and Rough SkinNon Greasy5-Layer epidermis Penetration Chemical-free ScentlessKEY INGREDIENTS: Glycerin, Vaseline Jelly, Oats Extract, Hyaluronic Acid.About VaselineWe believe that good skin health is essential for overall health. And we at HUL are on a mission to provide everyone, everywhere with the skin care they require. Our skin follows us wherever we go and moves with us throughout our lives. It is the only one we have. That is why Vaseline is dedicated to understanding and supporting skin health for people of all skin types and walks of life. So you can live without constraints. We've been committed to skin health since 1870, and we have no plans to stop until everyone, everywhere can enjoy healthy, healed skin.CompositionWater, Mineral Oil, Glycerin, Cetostearyl Alcohol, Petrolatum, Avena Sativa (Oat) Straw Extract, Sodium Cetostearyl Sulphate, Glyceryl Stearate, Paraffin, Dimethicone, Microcrystalline Wax, Sodium Carboxy Methyl Cellulose, Methylparaben, Dmdm Hydantoin, Propylparaben, Simethicone, Disodium Edta, Soyabean Oil, Bht, Perfume, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Amyl Cinnamal, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Citronellol, Geraniol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool.FeaturesFast absorbing and non-greasy formulaContains pure oat extracts and micro-droplets of Vaseline Jelly to lock in moistureMoisturising body lotion, clinically proven to restore dry skinDaily body lotion is best for dry skin and rough skinSuitable for all skin typesHow to UseFor ideal results, use the lotion twice daily.Pump, apply, and generously massage until absorbed.Other Product InfoEAN Code: 8901030971839 Country of origin: India
